difficulty.title: my # of attempts (difficulty ranking?) of notable DS3 and DS3 DLC ...
difficulty.body: I used a dexterity build. Typically the Uchigatana or Washing pole as my weapon. No summons were used. I solo'd them. Hardest for me: Twin princes: Lothric, Younger Prince - 60 attempts. Second hardest: Nameless King - 37 attempts Notable mentions: Darkeater Midir - 35 attempts. Surprisingly easy: Kiln of the First Flame - 1st first. Played him almost immediately after my victory of the twin ...

Difficulty: 7 out of 10. 10. Lothric, Younger Prince. Related: how to beat lothric, younger prince in dark souls 3. This fight isn't like the others where you can stay far away from him ...

strategy.title: How To Beat Lothric, Younger Prince in Dark Souls 3
strategy.body: Lothric, Younger Prince is not an optional boss. He must be dealt with in order to progress. Strategies for Defeating Lothric, Younger Prince. Here are some strategies for defeating Lothric, Younger Prince you can use depending on the build you opted for in Dark Souls 3: Melee Strategy. In phase 1, you will face only Lorian.
